name: blog
description: This is both the source files repository and the online compiled version (thanks to Jekyll and GH-Pages) of my personal [Blog](https://fabiofranchino.com/blog) where I throw my opinionated thoughts, tip&tricks and side projects documentations.

scripts.log: node log_process.js && git add _log && git add assets/log && git commit -m "push logs" && git push
